items.title: Tested: RayNeo X3 Pro glasses give a glimpse of AR in 2026 with a lot of compromises for the price
items.summary:
Today’s smart glasses generally fall into two camps: ones that put a big, wearable display in front of your eyes purely for entertainment, gaming, and media like Viture’s Lumar Ultra, and there are others like the RayNeo X3 Pro we’re checking out today – that aim to deliver practical, everyday AR experiences. I’m already a heavy user of the first kind for daily entertainment, but I’ve yet to see anything truly compelling in the “real” AR space for day-to-day use. I’ve been using the RayNeo X3 Pro as my primary pair of glasses for the past few weeks, and they offer a glimpse into where AR is in 2026 – full of potential, but still weighed down by deal-breaking compromises. Head below for a closer look and my full experience.

more…

items.title: U.S. consumer confidence collapses to lowest level since 2014
items.summary: NEW YORK, Jan. 27 (Xinhua) -- U.S. consumer confidence plunged in January to its lowest level in more than a decade, as U.S. people grew increasingly pessimistic about geopolitical tensions, high prices and the economic impact of trade policies, The Conference Board reported Tuesday. items.title: Anker extends SOLIX Winter Sale’s up to 65% power station savings – F3800 unit at $1,799 low, more from $150
items.summary:
Update 1/27: Anker has extended its Winter Sale (with some increased savings on select units) through to February 3 – giving you more time to take advantage of these deals. Prices have been updated below. We also recently dropped our hands-on review of the Anker SOLIX C2000 Gen 2 Power Station here.

Anker SOLIX is joining its competitors in bringing back previous holiday savings in the form of its latest Winter Sale that is offering up to 65% discounts and FREE gifts with select units. One unit I want to point out is Anker’s SOLIX F3800 Portable Power Station at $1,899 $1,799 shipped, which matches the price we’re seeing at Amazon, though be sure to clip the on-page 5% off coupon. It may have a $3,999 MSRP direct from the brand, but at Amazon you can find it starting between $2,399 and $2,599. It’s mostly been keeping above $2,000 since December, which is when we saw the $1,799 low from Black Friday and Cyber Monday sales rise in price. You’re looking at the next-best rate today that even beats out the previous New Year sale by $100, with $700 struck from the going rate ($2,100 off the MSRP), making this quite the surprise offer. Head below to check out the full lineup for Anker’s SOLIX Winter Sale while it lasts through the week.

more…

items.title: Keep track of items at a more budget-friendly cost with UGREEN’s Find My FineTrack tag 2-pack hitting a new $18 low

UGREEN FineTrack iOS Air Tracker Tags 2-Pack

Buy for $18 (Reg. $30)

What we love

Taking advantage of this UGREEN Find My tracker tag 2-pack (and its alternate 4-pack option on the same page), you’ll be getting a solid AirTag-like experience for hunting down lost or missing luggage, keys, gear, and more – all at a much more budget-friendly price. What’s more, each tag boasts a 1-year battery life and only requires a quick USB-C charge to top that battery off – plus, this is a new low price we’re seeing on this pair, too.
